problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,EF∥AB交AD于E,交BD于F,DE:EA=3:4,EF=6,则CD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, EF ∥ AB crosses AD to E, crosses BD to F, DE:EA=N_0:N_1, EF = N_2, then the length of CD is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查相似的三角形的性质与判定,解题的关键是利用EF∥AB,证明△DEF∽△DAB,本题属于中等题型．
